member.name: T:DictionaryFind
member.summary: Finds a value by key in the dictionary, or returns the default value for TValue. Just like Linq FirstOrDefault().

member.name: M:DictionaryFind.Find``2(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{``0,``1},``0)
member.summary: Finds a value by key in the dictionary, or returns the default value for TValue. Just like Linq FirstOrDefault().
